creator: sandeep.gupta@polaris.co.in
text:
When we start the build process we get the messege BUILDFAILED XML parser 
factory has not been configured correctly: 
com.sun.xml.parser.SAXParserFactoryImpl

creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
text:
There is something wrong with your enviroment,
please refer with more detail to the ant user list.
